'''v0.15.2 alpha''' is a minor update to [[Pocket Edition]], [[Gear VR Edition]], and the [[Windows 10 Edition]] Beta released on July 7-8, 2016 to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.15.1 alpha|v0.15.1]]. For iOS, this includes bug fixes from 0.15.1.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004168771|title=MCPE/WIN 10/Gear VR - 0.15.2}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=0.15.2|otherissuescount=2 |;From released versions before 0.15.0 |4267|Slow game startup (it takes a while to show anything). |8143|Can click invisible cancel button during terrain generation. |11279|Activator rail sounds like wool. |12153|Villagers don't farm land but take up seeds and crops.

|;From the 0.15.0 development versions |14665|Quitting in a 2 block tall space will move the player west when the world is reloaded. |14882|Sometimes, launching the player on a sticky piston with a slime block makes the player glitch through blocks. |15104|Player standing on the first block in a horizontal line of blocks attached to a sticky piston teleports to the end of the line when the sticky piston is activated.

|;From the 0.15.0 |15892|Equipping a horse immediately after taming it can crash the game }};
Other
* If your Realm expires, you should now get a screen asking if you want to renew.
* Fixed a crash on Android when it sent previous offline data.
